card.name: Eternal Moon, the Enlightened White Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultimate Evolution: Put on 1 of your light evolution creatures. Double Breaker While this creature is tapped and you have no shields, you can't be attacked. (Your creatures may still be attacked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Cyber" in its race. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of non-evolution creatures that have "Cyber" in their race and return them to your hand from the battle zone.
For each returned creature, you may put a non-evolution creature that has "Cyber" in its race into the battle zone. Double Breaker

card.name: Beginning Romanoff, Lord of the Demonic Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Grave Galaxy Vortex: Choose 3 darkness creatures in your graveyard and put this card into your battle zone on top of the chosen creatures. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may choose any number of cards under this creature and put them into your graveyard. For each card put into the graveyard in
this way, choose 1 card in your opponent's hand at random. Then, your opponent shows you that card and puts that card on the bottom of their deck. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed Attacker Power Attacker +5000 Triple Breaker No one may summon creatures with a cost of 4 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you tap mana to summon this creature, the mana number of Gods in your mana zone becomes 2 instead of 1. (Tapping a God to summon this creature
generates 2 mana instead of 1.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return any number of Gods from your mana zone to your hand. Your Gods cost up to 3 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Super Infinite Evolution: Put on 1 or more of your light creatures. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put any creatures
with "White Knight" in their names into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Hand Vortex: Choose 2 water creatures in your hand and put this creature into your battle zone on top of the chosen creatures. Meteor Burn: When one of your opponent's creatures attacks you, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, that attack is stopped. (The attacking
creature remains tapped and no shields are broken.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Vortex: Put on 2 of your darkness creatures. When one of your other creatures is destroyed, you may put that creature under this creature instead of the graveyard. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 4 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, your opponent chooses 4 creatures in their battle zone and
destroys them, then chooses 4 cards in their hands and discards them. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your Fire Birds. When 1 of your Dragons attack, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature you may put it under this creature. (If you don't, return the card to the top of your deck
face down.) Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 3 cards under this card into your graveyard. If you do, choose any number of your opponent's creatures with a total
power of 9000 or less and destroy them. If you put a Dragon with "Sword Flash" in its name into your graveyard because of this effect, you may untap this creature. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Galaxy Vortex: Choose 3 Dragons in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard If you do, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any non-evolution Dragons you reveal into the battle zone. Put the rest into your graveyard. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
[Blocker] Blocker Super Infinite Evolution: Put on 1 or more of your creatures with "Blocker". Meteor Burn-Shield Plus: When this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, put a number of cards under one of your shields
face down from the top of your deck equal to that card's cost. (Each bundle is still 1 shield.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Evolution: Origins. Meteor Burn: Whenever this creature would leave the battle zone, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, this creature stays in the battle zone. God Link - ADAM, God of Wordly Creation (Left Side) While this creature is linked, it gains "Triple Breaker".

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your Origins. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts that creatures on the bottom of their deck. Double Breaker God Link - EVE, God of Spiritual Creation (Right Side) Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks while linked, you may put 5 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, put all cards in your opponent's mana zone into
their shield zone face down as new shields.

card.name: Wan Ken, Crimson Lord ~Full Speed Ahead~

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Ken, Crimson Lord" in its name. When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Then, put 1 of these on the bottom of your deck, and return the other to the top of your
deck. Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Search your deck. You may choose a card with "Ken Gou, Crimson Lord" in its name and put it on top of this creature. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Cyber" in its race or Origins. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, return 1 creature in the battle zone to its owner's
hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
[Blocker] Blocker When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all of your shields into your graveyard. For each shield you put into the graveyard your opponent chooses 1 of their
creatures and destroys it. If they can't destroy a creature this creature breaks 1 of your opponent's shields. Triple Breaker

card.name: Bell Hell De Jackson, Monstrous Reaper

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When this creature attacks, you may destroy 1 of your creatures. If you do, search your deck. You may take an evolution Demon Command from it, show it to your
opponent, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever one of your other creatures is destroyed, or 1 of the cards under your evolution creatures is put in the graveyard, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures.
That creature gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature with 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your creatures with "Ken Gou, Crimson Lord" in its name. Soulshift Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Destroy all of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker". Search your deck. You may choose a card with "Ken Geki, Absolute Ruler" in its name and put it on top of this
creature. Then, shuffle your deck. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Fire Birds or Origins. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: God Link - Lia, King of the Gods (Left Side) or Macbeth, King of the Gods (Bottom Side) Whenever this creature links with another God, this creature gets +2000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your Dreammates or Origins. At the end of your turn, you may put a creature from your mana zone under this creature. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 3 cards under this creatue into your graveyard. If you do, all of your creatures get +12000 power and gain "Triple
Breaker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker God Link - Titus, King of the Gods (Left Side) or Othello, King of the Gods (Top Side) When this creature becomes a 4-part God, you may put a God into your battle zone from your mana zone. (A 4-part God has 4 Gods linked together to form 1 creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then, you may put 1 creature from your mana zone under one of your evolution creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution: Put on 1 of your Light Bringers or Origins. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, until the start of your next turn, all of your creatures gain
"Blocker" and all of your creatures untap at the end of your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever one of your other creatures is destroyed, or 1 of the cards under your evolution creatures is put in the graveyard, look at the top card of your deck. If that
card is a spell, you may show it to your opponent and put it into your hand.

card.name: Pillar of Feather, White Knight Fortress

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress You may have all of your creatures with "White Knight" in their names cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. All of your creatures with "White Knight" in their names get +3000 power and gain "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. When this creature blocks a non-evolution creature, it gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, choose an Evolution Creature in your Battle Zone. Search your deck for 2 creatures, reveal them, and put them
under the chosen Evolution Creature. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Parasite Worms or Origins Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. When this card is destroyed, instead of the graveyard, you may put this card under one of your evolution creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress When this Fortress is put into the shield zone to fortify a shield, discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random. You may have all of your creatures with "Reaper" in their names cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. All of your creatures with "Reaper" in their names get +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Infinite Evolution: Put on 1 or more of your creatures. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard.If you do, choose 1 of the following abilities and activate it: -Your opponent chooses 1 card in their mana zone and puts it in their graveyard. -Choose 1 of your opponent's cross gears and put it into its owner's graveyard. -Choose 1 Fortress that is fortifying your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your Dragons with "Sword Flash" in their name attacks, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with less power than that Dragon. Saver: Dragons with "Sword Flash" in their name. (If one of your Dragons with "Sword Flash" in their name is destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever one of your other creatures is destroyed, or 1 of the cards under your evolution creatures is put in the graveyard, you may choose a number. If you do,
reveal the top card of your deck. If that card has a cost equal to your chosen number, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 5000 power or less. (Afterwards, return the revealed card to the
top of your deck face down.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Dreammates or Origins Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you tap mana to summon this creature, the mana number of Origins in your mana zone becomes 2 instead of 1. (Tapping an Origin to summon this creature
generates 2 mana instead of 1.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy it. If you do, tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
[Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When you tap mana to summon this creature, the mana number of Origins in your mana zone becomes 2 instead of 1. (Tapping an Origin to summon this creature generates
2 mana instead of 1.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When this card is put into a graveyard, if just before it was put in the graveyard it was under an evolution creature, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put 1 creature with "Blocker" that costs 3 or less into the battle zone from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose 1 creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures with "NEX" in its name would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this card is put into a graveyard, if just before it was put in the graveyard it was under an evolution creature, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you tap mana to cast this spell, the mana number of Origins in your mana zone becomes 2 instead of 1. (Tapping an Origin to cast this spell generates 2
mana instead of 1.) Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put up to 2 of these into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you tap mana to summon this creature, the mana number of Origins in your mana zone becomes 2 instead of 1. (Tapping an Origin to summon this creature
generates 2 mana instead of 1.) Slayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy it. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's untapped creatures and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this card is put into a graveyard, if just before it was put in the graveyard it was under an evolution creature, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures. If you have a creature with "Reaper" in its name in your battle zone, your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you tap mana to summon this creature, the mana number of Origins in your mana zone becomes 2 instead of 1. (Tapping an Origin to summon this creature
generates 2 mana instead of 1.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may reduce the summoning cost of creatures with "NEX" in their name by 1. They can't cost less than 1. All of your Armored Dragons gain "Speed Attacker". At the end of your turn, return all non-evolution Armored Dragons you put in the battle zone this turn to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this card is put into a graveyard, if just before it was put in the graveyard it was under an evolution creature, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy 1 of your opponent\'s creatures with 2000 power or less OR choose 1 of your opponent\'s cross gears and put it in its owner\'s graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All of your other creatures with "NEX" or "Lupia" in their name get +1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this card is put into a graveyard, if just before it was put in the graveyard it was under an evolution creature, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn, all of your non-evolution creatures get +1000 power. This turn, all of your evolution creatures get +4000 power.
